wikipedia_page.main: Dominic Alldis (born 1962) is a jazz pianist, orchestral conductor, and arranger. He is also a business speaker and founder of Music & Management.

response: Alldis won Grammy Awards4 for his work with Sir Adrian Boult and Sir Georg Solti, was an Honorary Fellow of Westminster Choir College, Princeton, and in 1994 was named a Chevalier de L'Ordre des Arts et des Lettres. He was married to the violinist and teacher Ursula Alldis, and had two sons, the jazz pianist Dominic Alldis and Robert.

link_mentions.page: List of Bill Evans tribute albums
response: * 1996: Turn Out The Stars – The Songs Of Bill Evans by Dominic Alldis
